headline: Bill Ackman’s Fund Lost 12.9% in Early April
summary: Billionaire investor Bill Ackman is feeling the pain of the market upheaval prompted by President Trump's tariff policies.  Pershing Square Holdings, a $15 billion stock-picking fund that Ackman's investment firm manages, lost 12.9% this month through Tuesday, it said in a weekly update.  Since the start of 2025, PSH is down about 14% through Tuesday.
